renameAccountModal.nameInputPlaceholder: Enter a name for your account

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteAccountDisclaimer: Accounts on the Stellar network are immutable and can not be deleted. However you can remove any account from your Freighter App at any time using the 'Delete account' option. Verify your recovery phrase works before you do this.
settings.deleteAccountConfirmMessage: Make sure you have your recovery phrase in a safe place. You will not be able to recover your wallet without it.

anonymousDataSharing.title: Anonymous data sharing
anonymousDataSharing.description: Allow Freighter to collect limited information about usage. We will collect public keys, transaction amounts, and balances. This information will not be used for marketing or to identify you personally. We will not collect information such as name, address, email addresses, phone numbers, etc.

enable.title: Enable Analytics
enable.description: To enable anonymous data sharing, you'll need to allow tracking permissions in your device settings.
enable.instruction: Tap "Open Settings" below, then find Freighter and enable "Allow Tracking".

disable.title: Disable Analytics
disable.description: To disable anonymous data sharing, you'll need to change tracking permissions in your device settings.
disable.instruction: Tap "Open Settings" below, then find Freighter and disable "Allow Tracking".

hideDust.title: Hide small payments
hideDust.description: Hide received payments smaller than 0.1 XLM

memoValidation.title: Verification with stellar.expert
memoValidation.description: Validate addresses that require a memo

aboutScreen.title: About

faceId.title: Enable Face ID
faceId.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Face ID to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
faceId.promptDescription: Use Face ID to securely log in and approve transactions.
faceId.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

touchId.title: Enable Touch ID
touchId.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Touch ID to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
touchId.promptDescription: Use Touch ID to securely log in and approve transactions.
touchId.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

fingerprint.title: Enable Fingerprint
fingerprint.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Fingerprint to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
fingerprint.promptDescription: Use Fingerprint to securely log in and approve transactions.
fingerprint.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

faceBiometrics.title: Enable Face Recognition
faceBiometrics.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Face Recognition to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
faceBiometrics.promptDescription: Use Face Recognition to securely log in and approve transactions.
faceBiometrics.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

opticId.title: Enable Optic ID
opticId.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Optic ID to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
opticId.promptDescription: Use Optic ID to securely log in and approve transactions.
opticId.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

iris.title: Enable Iris
iris.description: Add another layer of security by requiring Iris to unlock your wallet or approve transactions.
iris.promptDescription: Use Iris to securely log in and approve transactions.
iris.footerNoteText: You can change this later in Settings.

discovery.legalDisclaimer: By connecting to these dapps, you acknowledge that you're interacting with them at your own risk. We cannot recover funds. Never share your recovery phrase or private key.

errors.collectionNotFound: Collection not found for the given address.
errors.notOwnedByUser: It appears this collectible is not owned by you.
errors.invalidAddressOrTokenId: Please make sure the collection address and token ID are correct.

moreInfo.title: Manage Tokens
moreInfo.block1: When you manage tokens on the Stellar blockchain, you're creating and controlling digital representations of value, such as currencies or tokens.
moreInfo.block2: This involves setting up token approvals, which allow users to hold and trade your tokens, and configuring flags to control access and usage. By leveraging these features, you can securely issue, distribute, and manage your tokens while maintaining compliance and flexibility.

removeTokenAlert.title: Remove token
removeTokenAlert.message: Are you sure you want to remove this token?

cantRemoveXlm.title: Can‚Äôt remove XLM
cantRemoveXlm.description: XLM is the native asset of the Stellar network and cannot be removed. It‚Äôs required to maintain your account and pay for transaction fees.

cantRemoveBalance.title: Token still has a balance
cantRemoveBalance.description: You can‚Äôt remove this token yet. To remove a token, your balance for this token must be 0. You must send or sell the remaining balance before trying again.

addTokenScreen.title: Add a token
addTokenScreen.disclaimer: Allow token to be displayed in your wallet. This does not add the token to your account.
addTokenScreen.removeDisclaimer: Remove token from being displayed and used with this wallet address

review.title: You are swapping
review.warning: Make sure to review the transaction above, once you confirm it's irreversible

errors.insufficientXlmForFees: Insufficient XLM for transaction fees. You need at least {{fee}} XLM to pay the transaction fee.
errors.noPathFound: No path found between these tokens

swapProcessingScreen.closeMessage: You can close this screen, your transaction should be complete in less than a minute

memoInfo.title: Memo
memoInfo.description: Some destination accounts on the Stellar network require a memo to identify your payment.
memoInfo.additionalInfo: If a required memo is missing or incorrect, your funds may not reach the intended recipient.

slippageInfo.title: Allowed slippage
slippageInfo.description: The maximum price change (in percentage) you are willing to accept between initiating and confirming your swap. If the market price moves beyond this tolerance, the transaction will not execute.
slippageInfo.additionalInfo: A higher slippage tolerance means you're willing to accept a larger price difference, which can help ensure your trade executes but may result in a less favorable price.

timeoutInfo.title: Transaction timeout
timeoutInfo.description: Transactions on the Stellar network have a set time limit for processing.
timeoutInfo.additionalInfo: If the transaction is not confirmed before this time, it will expire and need to be submitted again.

feeInfo.title: Transaction fee
feeInfo.description: Every transaction on the Stellar network includes a small fee to help keep the network secure.
feeInfo.additionalInfo: You can choose to increase this fee if you want your transaction to be prioritized and processed faster by the network.

errors.insufficientXlmForFees: XLM insufficient for transaction fees. You need at least {{fee}} XLM to pay the transaction fee.
errors.amountTooHigh: The amount entered is greater than the available balance
errors.malicious: This address was flagged as malicious
errors.suspicious: This address was flagged as suspicious
errors.maliciousTransaction: This transaction was flagged as malicious
errors.maliciousAsset: An asset was flagged as malicious
errors.suspiciousTransaction: This transaction was flagged as suspicious
errors.suspiciousAsset: An asset was flagged as suspicious

welcomeBanner.reserveExplanationText: This reserve helps maintain the ledger by covering transaction fees and discouraging the creation of unnecessary accounts, keeping the system efficient and functional.
